price: Então, os mágicos caíram prosternados. Disseram: "Cremos no Senhor de Aarão e Moisés."
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
